8.5 Error handling

ole-error-context

Function

Signature

ole-error-context ole-error => function-name

Arguments

ole-error
An instance of <ole-error>.

Values

function-name
An instance of <string>.

Library

COM

Module

COM

Description

Returns a string identifying the function involved in the error, usually the function name.

The ole-error argument is an instance of <ole-error>.

This function is the accessor for <ole-error>'s context: slot.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
